sentences.en: Collagen, a strong rubbery protein, supports the ear flaps and the tip of nose in humans.
sentences.cn: 一种像橡胶一样有韧性的蛋白质 —— 胶原, 支撑着人的耳骨和鼻尖.

sentences.en: He felt the rubbery solidity as the club came down.
sentences.cn: 棍子落下去,他觉得好像打在坚韧的橡胶上.

sentences.en: Its skin felt rubbery and firm like an old fashioned hot water bottle.
sentences.cn: 它们的皮肤结实而有弹性,就像一种老式的热水瓶.

sentences.en: Loved the comfort it gave me as I drew on its slippery, rubbery tip.
sentences.cn: 爱我吸吮着它那溜滑的橡胶头儿时候的那种安心的感觉.

sentences.en: She had the most rubbery face.
The eggs were overcooked and rubbery.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋煮得太老了，像胶皮似的。

sentences.en: The home - style bean curd is a bust , oily and rubbery ( Mark and Gail Barnett )
sentences.cn: 自制 豆腐彻底失败, 油滑而呈胶状 ( 马克及盖尔巴尼特 )

sentences.en: The mask is left on for about 15 minutes while it sets to a rubbery texture.
sentences.cn: 面膜敷上后等约15分钟，待其变成橡胶状质地。

sentences.en: The meat's a bit rubbery - you didn't cook it for long enough!
sentences.cn: 这肉有点嚼不烂,你烧得火候不够!

sentences.en: The mouth was not so much cruel as lifeless; thin, rubbery and the color of veal.
sentences.cn: 嘴与其说残酷,不如说无生命; 簿, 橡胶似的,牛肉色.

sentences.en: The product was a rubbery solid.
This mixture is then poured into rubbery final form when baked.
sentences.cn: 这些混合物当时是连续铺装成型的液态板坯,后经高温加热固化成型的.

sentences.en: Trolls are savage, rubbery grey - green skinned giants with a voracious appetite for flesh.
sentences.cn: 巨魔都是野蛮的, 他们有灰绿色橡胶般的皮肤和对肉类贪婪.

sentences.en: Very soft, pliable product with rubbery feel.
sentences.cn: 质地非常柔软, 易弯曲,具有橡胶的手感.

sentences.en: Wipe down and then dry the gasket the rubbery band around the doorthe cold inside.
sentences.cn: 擦拭干燥那个用来确保密封冷气的包裹在门框周围的橡胶带.

words.tran_cn: 橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师
扭转脖子看；好奇地引颈而望
橡胶似的；有弹力的；坚韧的
